Website is under construction!

I am Serdar Akkol, MD. I graduated Istanbul University, Cerrahpasa School of Medicine in June, 2018. After receiving my medical degree, I started to work with Dr.Josef Parvizi as a postdoctoral scholar at Stanford University until May 2019. To pursue my physician-scientist ideal, I started my PhD with Dr.Stephan Bickel and Dr.Ashesh Mehta.

Some important milestones:

  • 2019 June - Started Elmezzi Graduate School of Molecular Medicine
  • 2018 October - Started Post-doc at Stanford University
  • 2018 July - Graduated from Istanbul University Cerrahpasa School of Medicine
